mapper.insert: insert into spring_reply(rno, bno, reply, replyer) values(seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update spring_reply set reply=#{reply}, updatedate=sysdate where rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: select * from (select/*INDEX(spring_reply idx_reply)*/ rownum rn, bno, rno, reply, replyer, replydate, updatedate from spring_reply where bno=#{bno} and rno>0 and rownum<=#{criteria.pageNum}*#{criteria.amount}) where rn>(#{criteria.pageNum}-1)*#{criteria.amount}
select count(*) from spring_reply where bno=#{bno}
